data.title: The Captive on Blu-ray & DVD March 3rd
data.meta_description: Atom Egoyan's latest film The Captive is released on Blu-ray March 3rd.
data.text:
Eight years after the disappearance of Cassandra, some disturbing incidents seem to indicate that she is still alive. Her parents and detectives, and Cassandra herself, will try to unravel the mystery of her disappearance.

BLU-RAY/ DVD SPECIAL FEATURES*

Audio Commentary with Writer/Director Atom Egoyan

“Captive Thoughts” featurette

Alternate Ending

Deleted Scenes

*Subject to change

CAST

Ryan Reynolds upcoming The Voices, Green Lantern, Safe House, The Proposal

Scott Speedman Underworld: Evolution, The Vow, Barefoot, TV’s “Felicity”

Rosario Dawson Top Five, Sin City franchise, Cesar Chavez, Eagle Eye

Mireille Enos World War Z, If I Stay, TV’s “The Killing”

Kevin Durand X-Men Origins: Wolverine, Real Steel, TV’s “The Strain”

with Alexia Fast Jack Reacher, Fido, TV’s “Manhattan”

Christine Horne Survival Code, Stories We Tell, TV’s “Lost Girl”

Arsinée Khanjian Ararat, The Sweet Hereafter, Felicia’s Journey

Ian Matthews A History of Violence, Showtime’s “Queer as Folk”

and Bruce Greenwood Star Trek Into Darkness, The Place Beyond the Pines

PROGRAM INFORMATION

Year of Production: 2014

Title Copyright: The Captive © Queen of the Night Films Inc. All Rights Reserved. Artwork & Supplementary Materials © 2015 Lions Gate Entertainment Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Type: Theatrical Release

Rating: R for Language and Some Violence

Genre: Crime/Drama/Suspense/Mystery

Closed Captioned: English SDH

Subtitles: English and Spanish

Feature Run Time: 112 minutes

Blu-ray Format: 1080P High Definition 16×9 Widescreen (2.40:1)

DVD Format: 16×9 Widescreen (2.40:1)

Blu-ray Audio: 5.1 DTS HD Master Audio

DVD Audio: 5.1 Dolby Digital
